result.eng: Do you mean to carry on?

result.eng: Continous work will be involved to reach the target.

result.eng: This is a serious question.

result.html: ceist dháiríre é seoThis is a serious question.
result.ponchtml: ceist ḋáiríre é seoThis is a serious question.

result.eng: I asked that person a question.

result.html: chuir mé ceist ar an duine sinI asked that person a question.
result.ponchtml: ċuir mé ceist ar an duine sinI asked that person a question.

result.eng: They asked me the same question again and again.

result.eng: He asked me a question but I didn't answer him.

result.eng: She answered the questions.

result.eng: I haven't gotten an answer to my question yet.

result.eng: The reason why I am interested in this question more than other questions is because it concerns me personally.

result.eng: The question that bothers the American secret services most is, where are the Russian spies?
